Consent data string decoder

Consent data string decoder

That tool help you decode and understand what is stored by CMP as defined by IAB Europe.

⚠️ That tool is deprecated since it works only for TCF v1, now obsolete. You could now use iabtcf.com

You can find the vendorlist on the GDPR Transparency and Consent Framework repository.

Enter your consent data string (generated from a CMP)

Here’s a « demo » consent data string : BOPpXYgOPpXYgAAABBFRBC-AAAAcR7_______9______9uz_Gv_r_f__33e8_39v_h_7_-___m_-3zV4-_1vV11yPg1urfIr1NpjQ6OGgA

Decoded consent data string
